nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Agentic Telegram AI bot with LangChain nodes and new tools

## Overview
Automated workflow: Agentic Telegram AI bot with LangChain nodes and new tools. This workflow integrates 9 different services: telegramTrigger, stickyNote, telegram, toolHttpRequest, telegramTool. It contains 14 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 14
- **Node Types**: 9
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Window Buffer Memory**: memoryBufferWindow
- **Listen for incoming events**: telegramTrigger
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Send final reply**: telegram
- **Send back an image**: telegramTool
- **Generate image in Dalle**: toolHttpRequest
- **AI Agent**: agent
- **Error Handler**: stopAndError
- **Error Handler for 13b3488e**: stopAndError
- ... and 4 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
